description: I'd never self-celebrate and expect others to dip into their own pockets for me. Not how I was raised. But you'll pay for your own drinks.

If you're not going to be around, it's too much effort for you to make it to the location, or there's no familiar face on the guest list, it's absolutely fine. If it were me, I wouldn't come either. Besides, it's a win-win; you're either blessing me with your presence or blessing my wallet with your absence.
If you plan on turning up more than 15 minutes late, I'll only see that as a sign of disrespect of my time and money. You'd be better off staying at home. Don't bother yourself. Really.
